# contentView()

**Instance Method**

A view hierarchy that contains all the views which display the contents being searched.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func contentView() -> NSView?
```

## Return Value

The root view of the content view hierarchy.

## Discussion

This content view defines the view hierarchy to be dimmed during incremental search, if the `NSTextFinder` instance’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder/incrementalSearchingShouldDimContentView] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. If this method is not implemented or returns `nil`, then the `NSTextFinder` instance will act as if [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder/incrementalSearchingShouldDimContentView] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]

## Find Bar View

- **findBarView**: The view assigned by the text bar as the find bar view for the container.
- **isFindBarVisible**: Returns whether the container should display its find bar.
